data.description: a module for retrieving audio metadata
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
There are already a number of Perl modules that provide a way to
    access the metadata contained in popular audio formats. However,
    they differ in their interfaces, mainly because they need to
    maintain compatibility with the underlying C libraries they're based
    on. Audio::Info encapsulates these modules in a simple, easy to use
    way that is easily extendable for other formats.
